dialogue: How many missiles do these people have?
As long as they don't change their software, they can send as many as they would like for all I care!
I guess you have a point..
Hopefully we will gain something from our attack on their base..
I have already received several messages from our agents at the enemy's base that there are quite a few important documents lying around
Hopefully they will give us some insight into who is in charge of these attacks!
*alarm bells suddenly start ringing, except, they are playing a different sound than the usual one*
I haven't heard this alarm before? Is there another missile?
This is our unidentified object alarm. It means there is something coming towards us that our scanners do not recognise...
I prefer the missile alarm!
*{4} pulls up the camera system to see what the scanners picked up*
What on earth..
That can't be right...
Thats massive...
I think we need more walls...
*appearing on the monitor was the biggest missile the whole agency had ever seen*
{4}, can you access it's AI?
Already got it - and you aren't going to like it stopping distance...
What is it?
{endDistance}...
{endDistance}?!
It's strange that they made such an improvement with the missile's range, but still haven't fixed this backdoor? Oh well..
I need a lot of walls...
On it!
